nodes.bodyText: Is this still needed even when the manifest is changed?
Yes, because if you start the sleep timer, the dialog is not dismissed, which means we have to manual hide the keyboard.

The  documentation says:
 "stateAlwaysHidden" 	The soft keyboard is always hidden when the activity's main window has input focus.
As all search actions, or actions where the user has to input some text, were handled by fragments, the activity's main window does not get the focus and so the keyboard does not hide.
Anyway after dismissing a dialog the main window gets the focus again and the keyboard will hide.
